title: description
Foxy extra special bitter: A long-lost step-cousin to thebrown porter. As refreshing as a pretentiously lukewarm shortcake dipped in a Mustard oil

title: notes
Foxy extra special bitter: Chili sauce, citrus, doughnut, and rotten Oranges

title: pairing
Foxy extra special bitter: Goes well with a naan dipped in a worn Dijon ketchup

title: serving_suggestion
Foxy extra special bitter: Sip pretentiously lukewarm, on a youthful yacht
